title: K
data:
==Commands==
*Pressing '''k''' will move you up one square.
*Pressing '''shift+k''' will move you in this direction until you encounter a [[monster]] or something else interesting

==Symbols==
While playing in console mode:
*'''k''' represents a [[killer bee|bee]]-type monster.
*'''K''' represents a [[Kobold_(monster)|kobold]]-type monster.
